puppies.name: Mulan
puppies.description: She was adobted from SPCA. She spends most of the day outside and guards the house to ensure me and my husband is safe.

puppies.name: Frank
puppies.description: He is a very friendly boy, and was saved from a box dumped in a countdown parking lot.

puppies.name: Ollie
puppies.description: He is a lovely boy, but only accepts a limited number of pats before he absolutely destroys your hand. He chose us, just showed up at my flat  in 2012. Could not find the owners after a few weeks of searching, so I took him in permanently.

puppies.name: Chi
puppies.description: He loves to chew on anything he can get his hands on!  Come close and try to pat him, and he'll run!!!
